item.description:
11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation by Michelle Corey

How to Slow the Aging Process

Learn how to look as young as you can!

Learn how we age , why we age, what we do daily to contribute to speed up aging, and what we can do to slow the process, what nutrients to take internally and apply externally for optimum skin health!

Michelle Corey:  Health and Beauty Consultant

Michelle's diverse and rich background allows her to be a valuable resource for anyone wanting to improve and maintain health and vitality. She has had a passion for wellness and preventing aging her whole life and provides her client with a wealth of information with a focus on physical and emotional stresses, nutrition, and advanced skin care...Michelle currently consults for a North Shore Plastic Surgeon and owns a Business in Andover Ma.

    • CERTIFIED BIOFEEDBACK SPECIALIST –NATURAL THERAPIES BOARD
    • CERTIFIED NUTRACEUTICAL CONSULTANT
    • LICENSED COSMETOLGIST
    • CERTIFIED COSMECEUTICAL ANTI-AGING CONSULTANT
    • CERTIFIED IMAGE CONSULTANT
    • CONTINUING ED HAWTHORN UNIVERSITY-HOLISTIC NUTRITION

www.Carina-co.com

www.Beautymindandsoul.com
